name: Basic Web3 - Verifier Example
description: Basic Web3 journey with address, ETH, ERC20, NFT on mainnet and polygon

tasks.name: Have a wallet address
tasks.description: You need a wallet address to enter Web3 universe.

tasks.name: Have MATIC in polygon wallet
tasks.description: Own some MATIC on polygon. Using verifier `has-ETH`

tasks.name: ERC20: has 10+ ENS Token
tasks.description: Own 10+ ENS ERC20 Token. Using verifier `has-token-ERC20`

tasks.name: ERC20: has WETH on polygon
tasks.description: Own some WETH (Wrapped ETH, ERC20 Token) on polygon. Using verifier `has-token-ERC20`

tasks.name: Own an ERC721 NFT
tasks.description: Own an ENS NFT(ERC721). Using verifier `has-nft-ERC721`

tasks.name: Own an ERC721 NFT on polygon
tasks.description: Own an NFT on Polygon network. Using verifier `has-token-ERC721`
